channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16014] Get and Put constructor argument lists are divergent
item.description: API for construing Get and Put objects for a specific rowkey is quite different. Put supports many more variations for specifying the target rowkey and timestamp compared to Get. Notably lacking are Get(byte[], int, int) and Get(ByteBuffer) variations.
item.summary: Get and Put constructor argument lists are divergent

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.

comments.comment: Nick Dimiduk Are you going to take this issue ? I would like to solve this. May I ?
The issue is unassigned so feel free to lay claim. Assign it to yourself; if you can't, let us know and we'll make it so.
Hello Nick, I am not authorized to assign this issue to myself. Could you assign it for me ? Thanks.

Our JIRA administration has changed since I used it last. I've asked for help over on the dev list. Meanwhile, I've assigned it to myself to "claim it" on your behalf. Feel free to start working on this issue. I assume this is your first contribution – have a look at http://hbase.apache.org/book.html#developing . You'll make your changes, attach a patch vs. master branch to this ticket, and then we'll kick off the test automation.

Thanks for pitching in!

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
Add 2 constructors fot API Get
1. Get(byte[], int, int)
2. Get(ByteBuffer)
